member.name: PUBAPPINFO
member.summary: Provides information about a published application from an application publisher to Add/Remove Programs in Control Panel.

member.name: PUBAPPINFO.cbSize
member.summary: A value of type DWORD that specifies the size of the structure. This member is set by the Add/Remove Programs utility.

member.name: PUBAPPINFO.dwMask
member.summary: A bitmask that indicates which items in the structure are valid. This member can contain one or more .

member.name: PUBAPPINFO.pszSource
member.summary: A pointer to a string containing the display name of the publisher. This name appears in Add/Remove Programs if duplicate application names are encountered. The string buffer must be allocated using the Shell task allocator.

member.name: PUBAPPINFO.stAssigned
member.summary: The time when an application manager schedules the application installation. Add/Remove Programs does not allow the user to schedule an installation time later than the value in this member. This member is ignored if it describes a time prior to the current time.

member.name: PUBAPPINFO.stScheduled
member.summary: The installation time that the user sets by clicking Add Later. Add/Remove Programs calls the method with the pInstallTime parameter pointing to a structure that contains the time the user entered. The application publisher maintains this value for installation scheduling. returns the scheduled installation time in this member if the scheduled time has not been canceled using .

member.name: PUBAPPINFO.stExpire
member.summary: The time after which you cannot install the published application using Add/Remove Programs.
